## Tree Project - Chou 

```{r}
install.packages('rpart')
install.packages('rpart.plot')

library(rpart) 
library(rpart.plot) 

require(rpart) 
require(rpart.plot)


carData <- read.csv("Cars.csv")
```

```{r}

r <- runif(nrow(carData))
rCarData <- carData[order(r),]

```

```{r} 
m1 <- rpart(price~., data = rCarData[1:27000,], method = "anova")

rpart.plot(m1) 
summary(m1, type = 3) 

p <- predict(m1, rCarData[27001:29466,], type = "matrix")


sqrt(mean((p-rCarData[27001:29466, 17])^2))
```
